item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host Service Datatype Description The Monitoring_Query_Host type represents a monitoring instance. It consists of a hardware ID to monitor, an IP address attached to that hardware ID, a method of monitoring, and what to do in the instance that the monitor ever fails. Local arg1Value The argument to be used for this monitor, if necessary. The lowest monitoring levels (like ping) ignore this setting, but higher levels like HTTP custom use it.
